body.name: Anti-Theft Ring Doorbell Mount, No-Drill Installation. Ring Doorbell Holder for Apartment Door, Office and Home Door. Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/2/1. Blink Camera Door Mount

features: ❗Please Check: The door must swing inward for compatibility, and this mount is not suitable for iron security doors.

✅ Broad Compatibility with Most Doorbells: Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell (1/2/3/3 Plus/4/2020 Release) and Blink Doorbell Camera. Please note that the maximum dimensions for a compatible doorbell are 2.63 inches wide, 4.92 inches high, and 1.15 inches deep. (👀 Note: The doorbell is not included in the package)

✅ Suitable for Most Doors: Designed to fit most inward-opening doors. However, it's important to check your door size for compatibility before purchasing. The door thickness should be between 1.14 and 2.24 inches, and the door gap (the distance between the door and frame) must be over 0.06 inches with a flat edge.

✅ No Drill & Easy Installation: This mount allows easy placement and locking of your video doorbell without drilling, preserving your door's integrity. The package includes detailed installation instructions and necessary accessories for a hassle-free setup.

✅ ABS and high-quality metal: The doorbell holder clip is made of sturdy ABS and high-quality metal, stable enough to keep your video doorbell from being stolen. Perfect for apartments, homes, houses, dorms, rooms, offices, study, rentals, hotels, businesses building and so on. Provide a safe environment for you.

✅ Anti-Theft Doorbell Camera Holder: Designed with theft prevention in mind, this Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount combines security with aesthetics, offering peace of mind. Also referred to as a ring camera holder or blink camera holder.

✅ Package Contents: The package includes 1 Stainless Steel Mount, 1 Hard Plastic Shell, 1 Adjusting Screw, 8 pieces of EVA foam (60*30*3mm), 8 pieces of EVA foam (60*30*6mm), 6 Fixed Screws, 1 Power Wrench, 1 Larger Contact Area, and 1 Silicone Non-Slip Pad.

✅ Rain Cover Design: Our mount includes a rain cover, offering enhanced protection against rain for your doorbell. This waterproof, anti-theft Ring doorbell mount ensures your video doorbell operates effectively, even in rainy conditions.

reviews.reviewText: It works it does the job… only thing is that the motion sensors don’t pick up as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So happy to have found this product I live in an apartment building and I wanted to avoid drilling a whole on the property. This was super easy to set up perfect just what I was looking for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, wish it would extend to the middle of the door
reviews.reviewText: Overall it's a great product, just wish there was an extender to place the door bell camera in the middle of the door. My door is deep so the door frame obstructs the complete view to the right side. If you have a flushed to the wall door it will work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: My friends package got stolen recently and she couldn’t install her ring camera on her door so I got this for her and it fits perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: The item is like any other security to protect your ring camera. The issue for me is it does not work for an outward swing door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So this is 2nd one , we bought a diff brand but the screw thingie change in shape and we werent able yo unscrew . We had yo use the drill to take ring out . This Just seem sturdier.
